sub_title: Offshore Construction Manager at Van Oord Offshore Wind Projects B.V.
summary: Extensive experience in installation of offshore wind farms.

profile_positions.description:
- Preparing lifting and rigging plans for our projects.
- Provide operational input/experience on projects, tenders and new build vessels.
- Manage business process of lifting and rigging.
- Rigging stock management
- Office based role as part of the Foundation & WTG unit.
- OPITO LOLER Competent Person certified.
profile_positions.title: Lifting Competent Person

profile_positions.description:
- Working in the department handling issues in the Defect Notification Period of various wind farms
- Focussed on the operations side of the activities
- Office based role
profile_positions.title: Worksmanager Offshore Wind Customer Support

profile_positions.description:
Offshore wind farm project:
- Responsible for the full installation team onboard the installation vessel and related reporting
- Installation of 87 foundations of extended MPs with separate secondary steel
- Installed with jack-up vessel Aeolus
- Loading components at Sif Rotterdam Maasvlakte (The Netherlands)
- Client is Blauwwind
profile_positions.title: Offshore Construction Manager Foundation Installation Borsele III & IV

profile_positions.description:
Offshore Windfarm Project (Deutsche Bucht Offshore Windfarm)
- Installation of 31 MVOW 8.4 MW offshore turbines with installation vessel Aeolus
- Loading turbine components at Esbjerg, Denmark
- Onboard representative for the onshore Van Oord project team
- Liaising onboard between the client, vessel owners and MVOW
- Handovers with MVOW and Deutsche Bucht on behalf of Van Oord (chess clock)
- Responsible for the safe and successful execution of the works, managing the team of offshore installation riggers for the Van Oord scope of works and where we assist MVOW with their works.
- Report to the office regarding progress, paperwork (DPRs, ITPs, handovers with client and MVOW), etc.
- Lead daily meetings with the client, MVOW and vessel crew.
- Client is Deutsche Bucht / Northland Power
profile_positions.title: Offshore Construction Manager Deutsche Bucht WTG Installation

profile_positions.description:
Offshore Windfarm Project (Norther Offshore Windfarm)
- Installation of 44 MVOW 8.4 MW offshore turbines with installation vessel Aeolus
- Loading turbine components at BOW Terminal Vlissingen, The Netherlands
- Onboard representative for the onshore Van Oord project team
- Liaising onboard between the client, vessel owners and MVOW
- Handovers with MVOW and Norther on behalf of Van Oord (chess clock)
- Responsible for the safe and successful execution of the works, managing the team of offshore installation riggers for the Van Oord scope of works and where we assist MVOW with their works.
- Report to the office regarding progress, paperwork (DPRs, ITPs, handovers with client and MVOW), etc.
- Lead daily meetings with the client, MVOW and vessel crew.
- Client is Norther
profile_positions.title: Offshore Construction Manager Norther WTG installation

profile_positions.description:
Offshore wind farm project:
- Responsible for the full installation team onboard the installation vessel and related reporting

- Challenging soil conditions
- Installed with jack-up vessel Aeolus
- Loading components at Sif Rotterdam Maasvlakte (The Netherlands)

profile_positions.title: Offshore Construction Manager Foundations Norther Project

profile_positions.description:
Offshore Windfarm Project:
- Installation of 60 TPs with bolted MP-TP connection
- Managing subcontractor Jumbo Offshore and liaising with client onboard

- Loading components in Sassnitz, Germany
- Using SMST TAB motion compensated gangway
- Client is E.ON
profile_positions.title: Offshore Construction Manager Arkona Becken Südost Windfarm

profile_positions.description:
Offshore Wind farm Project:
- Installation of 87 grouted MP/TP foundations
- MP/TP installation with vessel Aeolus in jacked mode
- TP only installation with vessel Aeolus in floating mode
- Using SMST TAB motion compensated gangway
- Loading components in Belfast, Ireland

- Take care of all relevant paperwork (DPRs, ITPs, punchlists, etc.)

Offshore Windfarm Project (Eneco Luchterduinen)

- Responsible for the safe and successful execution of the works in my shifts, managing the team of offshore installation riggers for the Van Oord scope of works and where we assist Vestas with their works.

- Participate in daily meetings with the client, Vestas (MVOW), OCM and captain.

profile_positions.title: Superintendent Gemini Project

profile_positions.description:
Offshore Windfarm Project
Foundations:
- Installation flanged monopiles with installation vessel Aeolus.
- Unique foundation design, no separate TP but installation of secondary steel on the MP.
- Responsible for safe and successful execution of the works in my shifts, managing the installation team, paperwork (DPRs, ITPs, punchlists, etc.).
- Loading components in Vlissingen, The Netherlands

Infield cables:
- Cable pull-in of the infield cables on the WTG foundations.
- Monopiles with cable entry holes, Tekmar CPS.
- Responsible for the safe and successful execution of the pull-in operation on the TPs in my shifts, managing the tower team, planning of the next locations regarding (de)mobilisation of equipment on towers, crew vessels vs teams, paperwork (DPRs ITPs).
- Operating from port of IJmuiden, The Netherlands
- Client is Eneco
profile_positions.title: Offshore Superintendent Eneco Luchterduinen Project

profile_positions.description:
Offshore Windfarm Project
- Preparatory works for the foundation package regarding design, logistics and installation.
profile_positions.title: Superintendent Gemini Project

profile_positions.description:
Offshore Windfarm Project
Infield cables:
- Cable pull-in of infield cables on TPs and the OSS.
- Preparatory works for cable pull-in.
- On vessel DP Gezina equipped with Ampelmann gangway system and crew vessels.
- Monopiles with cable entry holes, Tekmar CPS.
- Responsible for the safe and successful execution of the pull-in operation on the TPs in my shifts, managing the tower team, planning of the next locations regarding (de)mobilisation of equipment on towers, crew vessels vs teams, paperwork (DPRs ITPs).

profile_positions.title: Offshore Superintendent DanTysk Project

profile_positions.description:
Offshore Windfarm Project
Load-out Monopiles and Transition Pieces (onshore)
- Project representative for Van Oord for loading monopiles and TPs at BOW terminal (Vlissingen, The Netherlands).

Installation Monopiles (SeaJack) and Transition Pieces (JB114) (offshore)
- Responsible for safe and successful execution of the works in my shifts
- Managing the installation team
- Paperwork (DPRs, ITPs, punchlists, etc.), participate in daily meetings with the client and barge master.
- Loading components in the port of Hartlepool, United Kingdom

Supporting cable termination phase and  (work daily offshore, sleep onshore)
- Managing and plan the various installation teams with regards to crew vessels, work to do, clashes, priorities.
- Responsible for safe and successful execution of the works in my shifts, paperwork (DPRs, punchlists, etc.).
- Joint inspections with the client for foundation handover and completion of works.
- Client is EDF
profile_positions.title: (Offshore) Superintendent Teesside Project
